content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5), and steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5). The boiler is currently out of fuel, and the steam engine is not connected to a power network.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that is currently not engaged in any research.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of an assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) that is not receiving electricity and cannot create automation-science-pack due to missing resources.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to boiler fuel
- Ensure to have coal or another fuel type in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Make sure to position pipes correctly to connect entities. Check the coordinates of the entities to ensure they are within the connection range.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
